programme.title: Wildest Indochina: Cambodia: The Water Kingdom
programme.desc: Cambodia's wildlife and climate is ruled by the monsoon cycle. It is a wild land of extreme rains, raging rivers and flooding lakes that create great challenges for its animals, and a fine balance between seasons.

programme.title: Wildest Indochina: Vietnam: Phoenix from the Ashes
programme.desc: Around 10% of the world's species live in Vietnam, with tropical jungles fit to burst with wildlife. But less than 50 years ago, things were very different. During the war, Vietnam's forests were decimated, but as it always does, life fought back.

programme.title: Wildest Indochina: Southwest China: China's Secret Garden
programme.desc: Tucked away in China's southwest corner is a hidden oasis unlike any other. Snow-capped mountains, temperate valleys and tropical jungles are home to a spectacular array of wildlife.

programme.title: Wildest Africa: Sahara: Life on the Edge

programme.title: Wildest Africa: Congo: the Untamed Heart

programme.desc: The remaining chefs are asked to prepare dishes for a reunion for Culver City High School's class of 1991. Two contestants are briefed on the event's Hawaiian theme and attendees' dietary requirements, and they must pass the information they receive.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Five dishes must be prepared in 45 minutes and each dish must contain beer. The winners will get to spend a VIP day at the races.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Car builder Ian Roussel digs out an old 1960’s dune buggy and brings it back to life with a modern twist.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Car builder Ian Roussel transforms a beat?up 1955 Oldsmobile into a classic custom. Part 1 of 2

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Car builder Ian Roussel continues the transformation of a beat up '55 Oldsmobile into a classic custom and takes on a Henry J chop top. Part 2 of 2.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Car builder Ian Roussel makes the ultimate shop van out of a 1949 International milk truck.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Car builder Ian Roussel transforms a 1948 Packard into a street cruising led sled.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Car builder Ian Roussel let's loose on an abandoned 70's trike kit and works his magic to turn the naysayers into believers.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Tunnels are discovered on Seefra which can be used to reach eight other Seefra planets.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: When an old man is killed, Beka, Rhade and Harper are the main suspects and stand trial.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Rhade leads the rebels in battle against a warlord on Seefra-5.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Dylan discovers that Beka's boyfriend was really Drago Musevini, and he used Beka's DNA to create the Nietzscheans.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Beka and Rhade find a test that will either grant them great wealth or drive them to madness.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Harper discovers a program that can destroy eight of the Seefra planets, killing millions.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Walk of Innocence
programme.desc: In 1970, eighteen-year-old Olive Waiker disappeared as she walked across Rotorua to babysit her nieces and nephews. Her semi-naked body was found hours later in a rest area south of the city..

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Without Warning
programme.desc: This week’s episode of Sensing Murder promises greater co-operation between psychics and police, attempting to uncover the truth about the death of 18-year-old apprentice plumber Regan O’Donoghue, who was killed in a hit and run in 2007.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Looking for Justice
programme.desc: This week, for the first time ever, the prime suspect in a murder enquiry has turned to Sensing Murder for help.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: When The Trail Goes Cold
programme.desc: This episodes involves the disappearance of 62-year-old Kaye Stewart, a woman who went missing while on a short walk on June 13th, 2005.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: The Patient Killer
programme.desc: In 1976, thirteen-year-old schoolgirl Tracey Ann Patient was plucked off Auckland's Great North Road. The following morning, her body was found dumped 16 km away in the Waitakere Ranges, having been strangled with a pantyhose tourniquet.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Headless Body: The Kim Barry Murder
programme.desc: In 1981, the headless and fingerless body of 19-year-old Kim Narelle Barry was found dumped in the bush at a mountain lookout near Wollongong, south of Sydney.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Killer Punch / The Will of Death
programme.desc: Sometime on the evening of 19 October 1990, the flamboyantly gay Sydney socialite Ludwig Gertsch was strangled with an elastic strap in the bedroom of his lover, Mr. Vincent Esposito.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Hunt for a Killer: The Claremont Murders
programme.desc: This chilling CIA episode details the long and difficult investigation which began with the disappearance of 18-year-old secretary Sarah Spiers from a night club in the up-market Perth suburb of Claremont on Australia Day 1996.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Cop Killer: The Winchester Assassination
programme.desc: The highest ranking police officer in Australia to be murdered, Assistant Federal Police Commissioner Colin Winchester was shot twice in the head at point blank range as he was getting out of his car outside his Deakin home on 10 January 1989.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: A Killer Amongst Us: The Norfolk Island Murder
programme.desc: On Easter Sunday 2002, on sleepy Norfolk Island in the south west Pacific, the body of 29-year-old Janelle Patton was found lying in an open field.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Gone to the Dogs
programme.desc: When Becky and Jake are forced to steal a horse, they find new depths to their relationship and Alex is dismayed when Claire starts buying up old nags from the sale yards.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: The Ghost of Things to Come
programme.desc: Claire discovers a hidden treasure which brings back ghostly memories of her mother and unleashes the fear that she too will die in childbirth.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: A House of Cards
programme.desc: A thirtieth wedding anniversary is no protection for Liz when Harry, suspicious about Claire's baby, discovers an even bigger lie.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Three Little Words
programme.desc: Alex struggles with the truth about his family as Harry tries to win his son back the only way he knows how. Sally comes to the realisation that her relationship with Nick is going nowhere and she makes a heartbreaking decision.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Repeat Offenders
programme.desc: An old friend of Tess makes a visit to Drovers planning to portray the lives of the woman in her next article. Becky and Meg clash over Jake's appointment as Killarney's new overseer.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Sins of the Father
programme.desc: Jake's true identity is revealed after his father and brother turn up wanting him to come home. Whilst weaning Phoenix from Blaze, Claire starts to realise that the lie about her baby isn't right and cannot last forever.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Brian Scudamore, 1-800-GOT-JUNK? founder and CEO, goes undercover as a driver and junk collector, hauling loads of unwanted clutter in the world’s largest junk removal franchise, and comes out collecting something much more valuable.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: For nearly 20 years, T&T Supermarket dominated sales, but now competition is “cut throat”. That's good enough reason for Tina Lee, the boss of T&T Supermarket, to swap her upscale lifestyle for a week working undercover in her own stores.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Jose Mas, the CEO of MasTec, one of the largest builders of telecommunication and energy systems in North America, poses as a recently laid off high school basketball coach, getting a second chance at starting a new career.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Stephen J. Cloobeck, the Chairman and CEO of Diamond Resorts International, is going undercover as a man pursuing his dream job in the hospitality industry.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Harlan Kent is the CEO of the world’s largest candle manufacturer, Yankee Candle. Harlan goes undercover as Dan Johnson, a chef from Cincinnati who was forced to close his restaurant and open up a retail store but has no experience in the field.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Roasts and Ghosts
programme.desc: The TAPS team is the first paranormal team to ever investigate the famed Friar's Club in New York City. Next, the team travels to the Main Street Armory in Rochester, New York.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: A Family of Spirits
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS heads to Mt. Pleasant, South Carolina to help the USS Yorktown's crew figure out if the paranormal activity they are experiencing points to their fallen heroes.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Harvesting Murder
programme.desc: A sugar plantation worker tied his daughter to a bed and went to work. Unable to escape, she died in a fire. Claims from the staff of Hawaii's Plantation Village in Waipahu.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: The Chopping Block
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS returns to Mansfield, Ohio to investigate the Bissman Building, where the current manager, Ellis Byrd, was nearly choked to death by a black mist.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Time to Cry
programme.desc: Kimo does a vanishing act for his day in court and now Dog and the posse have to find him. With precious few leads to follow Dog turns to the fugitive's on-again-off-again girlfriend, but she's initially reluctant to join the hunt.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Up on the Roof
programme.desc: Today, Dog and the family are back in Colorado and are about to make one of their most exciting captures ever. When the adrenaline-fueled arrest goes down, every family member will play a critical role.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Family Business
programme.desc: Dog and the Chapman clan start their hunt today with another well-established bail bonding family. As Dog's fame has grown, so have his responsibilities.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Felons Interrupted
programme.desc: Dog is confronted with two alleged felons in crisis. Family and friends of these bondees are convinced that they are getting into further trouble while awaiting trial, so Dog and the posse have to bring these men back to jail.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Let It Snow
programme.desc: Christopher is barely 21, already has a history of domestic abuse and assault, and is facing major time in a room without a view. This hunt won't be easy for Dog - the leads are few, informers and family are not forthcoming.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Rush from Judgment
programme.desc: Facing hard time for forging checks, Melissa pulled a vanishing act at her sentencing hearing, bolting from the courthouse in broad daylight. Lucky for her bondsman, Dog and his posse are in Colorado and ready to help.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Burn & Return
programme.desc: Dog is busy. First, he's after a fugitive who is allegedly an expert in the game of "burn and return"- shoplifting goods to return them for cash refunds. But he's not easy to track.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Dance Dads
programme.desc: Willie, Korie, Jase and Missy take dance lessons from Sadie to prepare for Reed and Rebecca's upcoming weddings. Jase's plan to perform Reed's wedding ceremony may fall through when he waits until the last minute to renew his ordainment.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: End of an Era
programme.desc: When Si decides to retire to pursue a music career, the family organizes a party in his honor. Meanwhile, Willie, Phil, and Jase take a road trip to try to recreate an old duck call for Si's retirement gift.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Looking Back and Talking Quack
programme.desc: The Robertson family takes a look back at 130 episodes of Duck Dynasty.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: The Grass & The Furious
programme.desc: It's all hands on deck for the Duckmen when an old high school nemesis challenges them to a good old-fashioned race.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Driving Miss Sadie
programme.desc: With Sadie's driver's license test fast approaching, she finds herself in dire need of lessons. Willie, Jase and Si each set out to correct her glaring failures behind the wheel by teaching her how to drive... Robertson-style.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Truck Commander
programme.desc: After Willie's son, John Luke, leaves Willie's pickup in the driveway with a bone-dry gas tank, Willie and Korie decide that it's time to get the kid his own car.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Si-Yonara
programme.desc: The Duck Commander assembly room gets an unexpected shakeup when a disgruntled Si decides to quit his job.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Fowl Play
programme.desc: Willie finds his office in shambles and alerts the authorities that the warehouse has had a break in.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: In British Columbia’s Fraser Valley, Kent Harrison Search and Rescue respond to a late night SOS for missing hikers.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Military and civilian Search and Rescue team up for a major SAR exercise.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Nelson SAR is en-route to rescue a snowmobiler who’s crashed and tumbled 35 metres down a mine shaft.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Penticton SAR helicopter long lines a driver off the roof of his car in the middle of an icy river.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Whistler SAR searches for two military pilots who crashed a T-33 jet in the Callaghan Valley. But there’s a catch… the pilots have been missing for over 50 years.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Nelson SAR enlists bystanders to help rescue an injured man perched on a log in the middle of a raging river.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Kent Harrison SAR works into the night to locate and extricate a paraglider hanging 30 metres up a tree in the forest.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: SAR teams say goodbye to fallen SAR member Sheilah Sweatman.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Fifty SAR members from Princeton and Penticton SAR search for an elderly woman who disappeared.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Bears converge on an injured tree faller alone in the wilderness as Nelson SAR races to the scene.

programme.title: Divorce Court: In My Feelings
programme.desc: Raymond, also known as @IamRollingRay, is an Instagram sensation who says his high school sweetheart is jealous of his social media fan base. Christian thinks Ray shows more attention to his fanbase, accusing him of cheating with his followers.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Caught Up
programme.desc: Syncere says Mark has lied and disrespected her on several occasions and she’s not going to stand for it anymore. Mark says he cheats on Syncere because she has a bad attitude and she gets on his nerves.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Runaway Love Part 1
programme.desc: After 21 years together, LaSonya claims her husband still can’t keep his pants zipped and quit the flirting. Daniea Lanier says he is fed up with her attitude and feels she would be happier if she had more self-esteem.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Runaway Love Part 2
programme.desc: After 21 years together, LaSonya claims her husband still can’t keep his pants zipped and quit the flirting. Daniea Lanier says he is fed up with her attitude and feels she would be happier if she had more self-esteem.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Lesbihonest
programme.desc: Porcha has had enough of Ivory's promiscuous behavior. He claims Porcha has more tricks and secrets than Houdini and her lying has taken its toll. Can Judge Lynn Toler help this couple or is it time for Cupid to take better aiming lessons?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Johnny on the Spot
programme.desc: Cornisha says Jawaun leaves for weeks at a time and returns broke and jobless. He says Cornisha is too bossy and picks fights causing him to blow up and take days away to cool down. Will they find a cooling point before their relationship melts down?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Game Boy
programme.desc: Christy is done with Demetrice's video game obsession! He said he's better off with his games than being accused of looking at every woman that passes by. Will Demetrice snap back into reality or is this game over?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Hashtag Freaky
programme.desc: Anita says Ronald is a chronic cheater and a sex addict. He demands sex constantly and when doesn’t get his way, he admits he feels forced to seek sex outside the marriage. Can Judge Toler save this couple?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Crazy About You
programme.desc: Mali is five years younger than his girlfriend Zay and they are total opposites. He still wants to party, and she is ready to settle down.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Out for Delivery
programme.desc: Jeanine says Marvin is cheating with co-workers and often meets up with his exes when they visit family in their hometown. He asserts she’s the one who cheated, not him, and she is so insecure she won’t stop bugging him about it.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Alpha Girl
programme.desc: Krystal is an alpha woman with a big personality and Caleb is not having it. Krystal resents him for proposing only after her father died while Caleb hates Krystal controlling their finances. Can Judge Toler help them?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Grumpy Old Man
programme.desc: Michaela and Richard’s 30-year age difference has finally taken a toll on their relationship. Richard says he just wants to settle down and enjoy the rest of his life and says that Michaela’s constant nagging is making him rethink marrying her.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: A House Divided
programme.desc: Dog has dropped Duane Lee from the team. When Leland confronts Dog and Beth about the decision tempers flare. But they have to come together to answer a cry for help from a mother who feels that the safest place for her daughter is jail.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Run Fugitive, Run
programme.desc: When the team hunts for Steven, a fugitive with a history of domestic abuse, they seek help from his girlfriend, who's been a victim of his abuse. Meanwhile, Beth trains for a 5K race to help raise awareness about domestic abuse.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Secrets and Lies
programme.desc: What do you do when you have a fugitive you not only want to find, but believe can be helped back onto the straight and narrow? If you're Mary Ellen you call your good friend Dog.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Tent City
programme.desc: Today's hunt takes Dog far from the glittering hotels of Waikiki to the parts of Hawaii tourist rarely see, Oahu's ramshackle tent cities. The team searches for a woman who has lost almost everything, her home, her family and her spirit.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Big Island, Small Town
programme.desc: Dog has problems when he goes to a small town on the Big Island of Hawaii to track down a fugitive. In a small town, everyone knows everyone else's business, making it impossible for Dog to hunt in secret.

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Cap and Gown
programme.desc: Friend of the family, Kili, is joining the team to help track down a runner on the Hawaiian island of Maui. This is not the only thing on their schedule, because after the hunt, Kili has to hurry off to his college graduation ceremony!

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: To Love and to Cherish
programme.desc: Dog and Beth are off to the Big Island for their wedding. They hope to relax for a few days but it turns out Leland has a fugitive he needs to catch and despite the time limit, neither Dog nor Beth can resist the opportunity to catch a fugitive.

programme.title: Run's House: Chicks Fly the Coop
programme.desc: Run's blood boils upon finding that his backyard pool house has become filled with family junk. He vows to clean it out, which unleashes conflict with every family member who wants to hang onto some possession.

programme.title: Run's House: Go for the Gold
programme.desc: Run often talks about how much he loves to win, but it's not until we see his family compete against one another that we understand that the drive to dominate runs thick in the Simmons blood.

programme.title: Run's House: JoJo Wins and Justine Loses
programme.desc: After overindulging at Russell Simmons' remarkable star-studded charity bash in the Hamptons, Justine decides to go on a diet. Determined to make it work, she enlists the help of a personal trainer.

programme.title: Run's House: Run's Family Vacation
programme.desc: When Vanessa gets a call from her Ford modeling agent to do a fashion shoot in Colorado, Run decides that bringing the family along for a summer vacation would be the perfect adventure to share before school starts.

programme.title: Run's House: Baby Fever
programme.desc: Looking at baby photos sparks Justine's desire to have another baby. Rev Run tries to convince Justine otherwise, but she is certain about what she wants.

programme.title: Run's House: A Healthy Heart
programme.desc: Run finds a dead fish in the family's tank and gives it a proper send-off with a prayer: "Ashes to ashes and flush to flush."

programme.title: Run's House: All Work & No Peace
programme.desc: Run heads to New York's Z100 radio station to speak with DJ Cubbie and promote his new album 'Distortion.' But Run is starting to feel the pressure of working and running a company.

programme.title: Run's House: Maximum Growth
programme.desc: Vanessa is approached to pose in Maxim Magazine, but is concerned about her father's reaction. Meanwhile, Jojo tries to pass his "behind-thewheel" test for his Driver's Permit. And the Rev gets a "sign" to buy a new Lamborghini.

programme.title: Run's House: Vegas Vacation
programme.desc: Rev has a shoe convention to attend in Las Vegas and takes the family with him. Rev enlists help from Vanessa and Angela to plan a surprise for Justine.

programme.title: Run's House: Rev's Fix It List
programme.desc: Some of Rev's husbandly habits are wearing thin on Justine and leaving her feeling disrespected. Rev is shocked to hear that there are a "few" things to improve and challenges Justine to make a list.

programme.title: Girlfriends: Too Much Sharkin
programme.desc: Joan blows the lid off William’s office romance.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Anniversary
programme.desc: Ever since a close-knit Kentucky family moved into their new home, they've been visited by the spirit of a young girl.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Shape Shifter
programme.desc: PRS travels to Shapleigh, Maine where a woman and her daughter are reporting attacks from a winged creature with sharp teeth. Psychic Chip Coffey arrives and senses a half-human, half animal presence.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Vegas
programme.desc: The PRS travels to Sin City to investigate a 14-year old medium who claims to speak to a dead girl.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Freshmen Fear
programme.desc: A young female student claims to have seen a ghost in her dorm room.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Death Room
programme.desc: PRS arrives in Ryan's hometown to help the new owner of an old southern plantation unearth its dark history.?A painful family secret reveals a tale of greed and neglect, and the team must help free its unwilling victim from her spiritual prison.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Sixth Sense
programme.desc: A worried mother calls the Paranormal Research Society to help her son Matthew, a boy who sees dead people. Matthew's story strikes a chord with team leader Ryan Buell who also experienced paranormal activity as a child.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Boy Pushed Me
programme.desc: Bruce and Danielle are terrified by an EVP recorded in their Indiana home stating "Kill them." Even more chilling, their toddler son survived a fall out of a window only to tell his parents, "Boy pushed me."

programme.title: Paranormal State: Family Ties
programme.desc: Jimmie is haunted by the apparition of a mysterious old woman who peers at him in the bathroom of his family's Petersburg, VA home.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Shadow Caster
programme.desc: PRS investigates an Alabama home where clients, Georgiana and her two daughters, are so terrified, they moved out after only 18 months. They have seen shadow figures, been touched and have a recorded EVP stating, "Look at me, get out of here."

programme.title: Paranormal State: Dwelling of the Dead
programme.desc: A single mom claims she is being physically assaulted by a spirit in her Kentucky home. Ryan first explores a natural explanation for the alleged phenomena. But the client's five-year-old son also sees spirits, and his sightings appear to line up.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Ghost On the Tracks
programme.desc: PRS is called to a New Jersey beauty salon, but they soon learn that the building's proximity to deadly train tracks might be the true cause of spirit activity.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Dudley Castle
programme.desc: The ruins that make up Dudley Castle house a plethora of paranormal activity for Yvette and her team to investigate. Strange noises and a violent poltergeist await them as they turn the lights out and do battle with the unseen forces.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Llanfyliln House Part 1
programme.desc: Workhouses were not the best of places to be, so why would anyone stay after they had died? Yvette takes her team on a memorable journey to find out. For a few team members it was a night they will never forget as they are pushed to the very limits.

programme.title: Battlerstar Galactica

programme.title: Battlerstar Galactica
programme.desc: Apollo and Starbuck lead a group of convicts on a possible suicide mission to destroy the cannon, which is located on an icy planet.

programme.title: Battlerstar Galactica
programme.desc: Commander Adama is trapped in a compromising courtship with a woman from his past; while an unwilling sheriff is forced to defend inhabitants of a farming community against vicious, pig-like creatures called Borays, who have killed all previous sheriffs.

programme.title: Battlerstar Galactica

programme.title: Battlerstar Galactica

programme.title: Family Ties: Hotline Fever

programme.title: World's Greatest: Monuments & Landmarks
programme.desc: Many of the world’s most significant manmade wonders serve not as dwellings, but as powerful signposts. But more than giving us direction, they tell us a story - they characterize powerful forces, or commemorate power lost.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Port Cities
programme.desc: Some of the most stunning cities are port cities - Sydney, Rio, Cape Town - and are also some of the most culturally diverse and vibrant. The great maritime cities of the world bridge countries and continents and unite the global community.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Grassland Animals
programme.desc: Grasslands are the great stages of the natural world where large animals play out spectacular lives in clear view of people, including lions, leopards, elephants, rhinoceros, cheetahs, impalas, kangaroos, wallaby, potoroo, bison, and wolves.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Mega Cities
programme.desc: Mega Cities provide a bustling home to populations of over 10 million. Travel from the high-density living of Shanghai and Bangkok to the sprawling cities of Delhi and Mexico City, each the backdrop for dynamic cultures.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Marine Animals
programme.desc: From the surprises of colorful reef characters to effervescent penguins, killer sharks, and regal whales, dive into the places where nature reveals itself in some of its most marvelous and bizarre forms.

programme.title: Arthur: Arthur vs. The Piano/The Big Blow-Up
programme.desc: Arthur gets stage fright during a rehearsal. Will he be able to get through his recital without any mistakes? Then, two opinionated friends butt heads! Can Francine and The Brain put aside their differences for the good of the soccer team?

programme.title: Arthur: Arthur's Family Vacation/Grandpa Dave's Old Country Farm
programme.desc: What's got moldy bathrooms, lumpy beds and lots of rain? Arthur's family vacation. Then, Arthur and D.W. go to visit their grandfather, but the visit doesn't turn out as expected, because Grandpa Dave isn't your usual kind of grandfather.

programme.title: Arthur: Arthur's Underwear/Francine Frensky, Olympic Rider
programme.desc: Arthur thinks it's hilarious when Binky Barnes' pants split during class--until he starts having nightmares about it happening to him. Then, Francine secretly dreams of being an Olympic equestrienne, but first she has to learn to ride.

programme.title: Arthur: D.W. Beats All/Buster the Myth Maker
programme.desc: After the Tibbles get a set of drums to play at the music festival, D.W. is determined to get an even bigger and louder one. Then, Buster is always telling the most incredible stories, but now he claims there is a tiger in the state forest.

programme.title: Arthur: Flippity Francine/Muffy Takes the Wheel
programme.desc: When Muffy posts a goofy video of Francine on the Muffington Post, Francine worries she will become the laughing stock of the entire school. And it's the 1st Annual Lakewood Derby and Muffy's revved up!

programme.title: Arthur: Home Sweet Home/Do You Believe in Magic
programme.desc: It’s time to celebrate summer! Join Arthur as he takes a family vacation and visits Grandpa Dave’s farm. Then, Arthur, D.W. and Buster spend a few days at the beach where they discover the simple joys of building sandcastles!

programme.title: Arthur: The Making of Arthur/Dancing Fools
programme.desc: When Matt Damon puts out a call for homemade videos for his TV show, he sets off a frantic rush as Arthur and his gang film their lives. Mrs. Molina is a teaching a dance class for kids. Will Francine and George be the next Fred and Ginger?

programme.title: Arthur: Binky Vs. Binky/Operation: DW!
programme.desc: Binky may be tough and strong, but when it comes to sports, he always seems to choke. D.W. is having trouble hearing and needs an ear operation. Is it okay to be just a little bit scared?

programme.title: Arthur: Buster Baxter, Cat Saver/Play It Again, D.W.
programme.desc: A cat gets stuck in a tree and Buster Baxter saves the day! Risking life and limb! Next, the ridiculous Crazy Bus song is EVERYWHERE, but mostly it's in the Read's home, because D.W. has to play it 4000 times a day.

programme.title: Secret War: The Dutch Disaster
programme.desc: Operation North Pole was a WWII German deception using captured SOE agents to mislead Britain. 47 of 50 agents were captured. Despite warnings, SOE ignored signs of compromise to maintain support, leading to a major intelligence failure.

programme.title: Secret War: The Scholar and the Fight for Greece
programme.desc: Monty Woodhouse, a professor and a legend for blowing up the Gorgopotamos Bridge in Greece in 1942. In the British counter attack against Rommell at Al Alamein in North Africa it was vital to disrupt German supply routes, Greece.

programme.title: Secret War: The Banker, the Norwegians & the Bomb
programme.desc: Sir Charles attended Eton, and then joined the Coldstream Guards. He won the Military Cross on the Western Front and, having survived the war, returned to banking.

programme.title: Secret War: Double Agent Tricycle
programme.desc: Dusan Popov was almost certainly James Bond. Ian Fleming knew all the stories about him. Popov managed to persuade both the Germans and MI6 to keep him in the style of a millionaire businessman while performing a series of missions against the Nazis.

programme.title: Secret War: The Mafia Connection
programme.desc: Lucky Luciano, a mafia boss of the 1930s, was in jail in 1942 on charges of running prostitution rings. US intelligence services did a deal with him and he got the Italians to share intelligence on German U boat movements.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Bianca & Brogan
programme.desc: When Brogan disappears from the Internet, then returns online after a year without question, Bianca wants to know what happened in the missing year.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Jarrod & Abby
programme.desc: How do young people who've embraced the digital age find love? Often by connecting online with others they've never met in person before. The problem -- that cute guy you may be falling in love with could be lying about who he really is.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: Alante has been planning a life with his online love. She's perfect but her disappearances have Alante worried. Nev and Max help uncover a truth that affects Alante's entire town. (S6, ep2)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: Divorcee Shawny calls Nev and Max to help uncover the shadowy identity of her attempt at new love. But things get interesting as they discover that Shawny may have secrets of her own. (S6, ep1)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Antoinette & Albert
programme.desc: A year after meeting 'T-lights' on Instagram, 'instaceleb' Antoinette is ready to meet him, but he always brushes off the idea. Is he really the online celebrity he claims to be?

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Hundra & Emily
programme.desc: Hundra never planned on falling in love with a girl and is risking coming out on national TV to learn if her love is for real. Nev investigates to reveal a shocking Catfish. (S4, ep17)

programme.title: Friendzone: Friendzone 103
programme.desc: Peter's best friend, Victoria is going off to college and he MUST confess his feelings before she leaves. Christie, a hockey player with Olympic aspirations, must get out of the Friendzone with her best friend Dylan.

programme.title: Friendzone: Friendzone 104
programme.desc: Alex wants his best friend Anthony to be his first boyfriend. Dan puts years of friendship on the line to confess his feelings to Katie.

programme.title: Friendzone: Friendzone 105
programme.desc: Fitz hopes that confessing his love to his best friend Michelle will lead to love. Shelly thinks that her "clown" persona won't turn off her best friend as she asks him to be her boyfriend.

programme.title: Friendzone: Friendzone 106
programme.desc: Jaime has only known Steve for a year but the feelings she has for him make her want to be more than friends. Together Jackie and Frank have lost almost 200 pounds, newly fit Jackie now wants to make Frank her boyfriend.

programme.title: Friendzone: Friendzone 107
programme.desc: Jeremy plans a picnic to confess his deep affection for his best friend Amanda. Self-proclaimed ladies' man Nate thinks he's finally found a girl to make him quit his partying ways.

programme.desc: Katy wants to make her friend of 8 years, Brian, her boyfriend. Jackie reveals her heart to her best friend Ed right before his rock show.

programme.title: Friendzone: Friendzone 110

programme.desc: Stephanie is tired of only fantasizing about Mike's "sexy face" and she's ready to make him her boyfriend. Sean and Kate were friends at first sight, now Sean wants to up the stakes.

programme.desc: David tells his best friend Maia that he's been in love with her for 9 years. B-Hawk tries to prove to his friend Toni that there's more to him than meets the eye.

programme.desc: In this season finale, Heidi makes her final decision about moving in with Spencer. Lauren looks to Audrina to fill the void left by her best friend, and Whitney flies to New York. (S2, ep12)

programme.title: 48 Hours: Murder in L.A.
programme.desc: Focuses on two California couples: the Adairs and the Shapiros. Mindy Shapiro discovered that her husband Michael, an orthopedic surgeon, was having an affair with Jeanie Adair, and in 1996, after 11 years of marriage, the couple opted for divorce.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Fatal Mistake

programme.title: 48 Hours: The Perfect Family

programme.desc: Garfield wakes up to discover he's in the wrong cartoon./Orson can't pick up a book without reading it./Garfield and Odie stay in a ritzy pet hotel.

programme.desc: Jon buys a jewel from a phony Swami. Garfield offers the viewers a chance to make story choices with disastrous results.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Garfield and Friends
programme.desc: Jon has an auto accident and must deal with mechanics and insurance agents.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: Two Thousand
programme.desc: Joe Collins is a nuclear scientist who is made to believe that he is a prisoner in the year 2000 and is about to be executed as part of the IMF's plans to learn where he has hidden enough plutonium to construct a dozen atomic bombs.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: The Deal
programme.desc: Robert Webber guest stars as Charles Rogan, a syndicate leader with the key to the five million dollar bankroll that will finance the overthrow the government of Camagua.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: Leona
programme.desc: Robert Goulet guest stars as Joe Epic, a syndicate crime leader and key figure in an IMF plan to free a captured undercover agent.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: TOD-5
programme.desc: To locate a terrorist ring called Alpha Group, the IMF convinces turncoat intelligence agent Gordon Holt (played by guest star Peter Haskell) that he's been exposed to the stolen biological weapon he's been hired to deliver.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: Cocaine

programme.title: Barney and Friends: A Picture of Friendship

programme.title: Barney and Friends: It's Showtime!

programme.title: Barney and Friends: A Wonderful World of Colors and Shapes

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: Cousin Riff is moving to town. Barney encourages everyone to put on a special show.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Moving Along

programme.title: Barney and Friends: A Perfectly Purple Day

programme.title: Wardens: Teaching, Fishing, and Fawn
programme.desc: A conservation officer in Michigan's District 6 encounters a captive fawn while officers in D2 patrol walleye anglers. An officer also works as a college professor while he's off-duty.

programme.title: Wardens: Hot Boats
programme.desc: Michigan conservation officers in the state's District 7 patrol during a late-summer boat party and also monitor watercraft that may be exceeding the speed limit for boats. Also, a look at geocaching in state parks.

programme.title: Wardens: Teal and Turkeys
programme.desc: A Michigan conservation officer in D-6 patrols on the opener for teal and geese. D-5 officers recount a turkey case that they never would have been aware of without a tip from a caller.

programme.title: Wardens: September in the UP
programme.desc: Two Michigan conservation officers patrol bear hunters, waterfowlers, and ORV operators in the state's Upper Peninsula during the busy month of September. Also, a look at volunteers cutting shooting lanes for an accessible blind.

programme.title: Wardens: Whitefish and ORVs
programme.desc: One Michigan conservation officer patrols users of off-road vehicles during the Memorial Day weekend. Other officers check on whitefish anglers in chilly conditions. Also, a look into a walleye survey at a large inland lake in the UP.

programme.title: Wardens: Winter Recreation and Firearm Deer
programme.desc: A Michigan conservation officer in D-7 checks on snowmobilers and ice anglers during a chilly February weekend. Another officer in D-7 and one in D-1 check on hunters during the firarm deer season.

programme.title: Wardens: Deer, Foraging, and Scenarios
programme.desc: Two Michigan conservation officers in the state's District 8 look into a case of trespassing and violating the safety zone law during the firarm deer season. Two experts in wild mushroom foraging go hunting for edibles and share their knowledge.

programme.title: Wardens: Firearm Deer and Patriot Award
programme.desc: Michigan conservation officers in the southeast part of the state check on deer hunters that may be trespassing and within the safety zone of an occupied dwelling during the firearm deer season.

programme.title: Wardens: Firearm Deer and Fowl
programme.desc: A Michigan conservation officer looks into an illegal deer during firearm deer season. The state's DNR offers tips on how to bag a bear, and conservation officer recruits receive lessons in operating snowmobiles.

programme.title: Wardens: Firearm Deer and Michigan Sturgeon
programme.desc: Michigan conservation officers in both the Upper and Lower Peninsulas monitor hunters during the firearm deer seaon, as well as a look at the state's efforts to help the sturgeon population in state waters.

programme.title: Wardens: Walleye and Women
programme.desc: Michigan conservation officers patrol walleye anglers on the Detroit River and a DNR class focuses on getting more women into the outdoors.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers: Two Accused of Murder (Jennifer Charron Case)
programme.desc: On Sunday, April 29, 2007, the body of Jennifer Charron, 21-years old, was found burnt to a crisp in a forest near Royan. The young waitress, who had been missing for two days, was visibly beaten and tied up.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers: Deadly Trap in the Forest - Christophe Belle
programme.desc: On March 19th 1998, Akira Ojima, a 57 years old japanese architect, is found dead in the fridge of a villa in Nanterre.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers: A Dire Deception (Laurence Maille Case)
programme.desc: On November 28, 2007, Laurence Maille disappeared. It was her partner, John Zablevski, who alerted the Vimy police in Pas-de-Calais. He explained that the young woman had left in the morning for a walk with their dog and never returned.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers: The Little Martyrship of A10: The Inass Touloub Affair
programme.desc: On August 11, 1987, the Orléans police discover the bruised corpse of a 4-year-old child behind a guardrail on the A10 motorway.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers: Death Trap On the Road (Schaaf Case)
programme.desc: A damaged bike belonging to Karine Schaaff, 16, is found abandoned by the side of a road in Moselle.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Surprises
programme.desc: After six months working undercover, Andy and Nick’s operation goes sideways when Nick, then Andy go missing. Meanwhile, a random arrest at 15 Division puts Sam Swarek and the other officers in the middle of the investigation-turned-rescue-mission

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Homecoming
programme.desc: On her first day back at 15 Division, Andy must work with Swarek to track down an ex convict determined to get his old life back at any cost. Andy realizes just how much has changed since she walked away from her old life six months ago

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Different, Not Better
programme.desc: Andy is partnered with Swarek’s new girlfriend, Officer Marlo Cruz. When they come face-to-face with an out of control EDP [Emotionally Disturbed Person], their differences are put to the test and one of them has to pull the trigger.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: The Kids Are Not Alright
programme.desc: Andy has her sights set on a much-needed long weekend. But when a routine highway check leads to the discovery of a teenage boy in the trunk of a car, Andy and Gail must convince him that no heartache lasts forever

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Poison Pill
programme.desc: After a messy drug arrest, Andy and Marlo are quarantined together. Meanwhile, 15 Division springs into emergency response mode in order to get the contaminated drugs off the streets before a deadly outbreak sweeps through the city.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Skeletons
programme.desc: When a young woman is reported missing, the officers of 15 Division soon discover a possible copycat connection to one of their division’s most distressing cases. With the clock ticking, Gail must face her worst fears..

programme.title: Megan Leavey
programme.desc: Young Marine Cpl. Megan Leavey starts to identify with Rex, a particularly aggressive combat dog that she trains. Together, they complete more than 100 missions until an improvised explosive device injures both, putting their fates in jeopardy.

programme.title: Power Rangers
programme.desc: A group of high-school students, who are infused with unique superpowers, harness their abilities in order to save the world.

programme.title: Destruction: Los Angeles
programme.desc: A fatal explosion and a sudden earthquake rock Los Angeles, and reporter John Benson seizes his chance to cover the breaking news.

programme.title: A Century of Science Fiction: Power of the Mind
programme.desc: This fascinating chapter takes a look at such mental manifestations as ESP, mind control, and telekinesis.

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Vampire's Kiss

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Mr. Right

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Sydney at Ten
programme.desc: Sydney's roommate from school is on track of a pendant from her past and enlists Sydney to help find it and catch the killer.

programme.desc: Arabia 843 AD: A sheik uses the Light of Truth to reveal his general as a traitor. 2001: Prince Shareem drops out from Sydney's class to go search for the Light of Truth.

programme.desc: Objects shot down in US/Canada airspace. Pentagon feigns ignorance. Alien involvement?

programme.desc: Our evolution may be influenced by our ancestors and their Gods. We are not alone in the universe.

programme.title: Autopsy

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: Ashlocke goes back in time to try and make himself invincible by giving something to his the younger self, prompting Brennan and Shalimar to follow him.

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: The team heads into the wilderness to track down a killer beast which is targeting hikers.

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: Ashlocke is desperate to find a cure for his fatal condition and infiltrates the Sanctuary to blackmail Adam into getting hold of the antidote.

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: A military plane is shot down behind enemy lines, prompting the team to make a desperate bid to recover the secret government weapon hidden on board.

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: The team sets out to save Brennan, who has become trapped inside an invisible town and is facing execution for a crime he didn't commit.

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: Three extraterrestrials who pose a serious threat to humanity target Shalimar, so the team sets out to save her from their evil clutches.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Street Chase
programme.desc: Sandoval is watching via nanobots inside Street as she tries to decipher Ma'el's riddle. She tries to figure out how to escape from Sandoval and the Taelons forcing her to solve the riddle. She flashes back to childhood fears.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Trapped by Time
programme.desc: Liam and Renee learn of a facility where time travelers from the future are being held. They try to learn from them what happens to the Taelons. Sandoval's wife is used as a pawn to gain important information from him.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Atonement
programme.desc: Sandoval goes to Renee to request a trial to testify to atrocities against humanity committed by the Taelons. A manhunt for Sandoval begins when he quits and leaves the mother ship. Liam has to protect him on his way to the grand jury.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Blood Ties
programme.desc: Strange assaults and several deaths may be related to a Doors/Taelon joint venture where Taelon core energy was used to heal people. It appears that the energy is being sucked back out of the patients.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Hearts and Minds
programme.desc: When Renee's boyfriend appears to her while he is imprisoned on the mother ship, Liam theorizes a special energy bond between the pair. Zo'or is upset by the human's betrayal and bans all humans from the mother ship.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Epiphany
programme.desc: The Taelons announce that they will all go into death stasis and wait on the mother ship for humans to discover how to create core energy and revive them. Zo'or and Da'an don't trust each other to be the last to submit to stasis.

programme.title: The Lost World: Ice Age
programme.desc: A new Ice Age threatens the ecosystem. The explorers investigate the site of a meteor crash and try to help a woman. Not knowing who she is, they are targeted by her cold-blooded subjects.

programme.title: The Lost World: The End Game
programme.desc: The intractable Death comes to settle her score with Lord Roxton. In a series of games, Roxton plays Death in an attempt to keep his life, as well as the lives of his friends.

programme.title: The Lost World: Phantoms
programme.desc: Veronica is led by the sound of piano music into the arms of a lover from a bygone era. Ignoring Challenger's warnings about her involvement with him, she falls quickly for her new beau.

programme.title: The Lost World: The Secret
programme.desc: An assassin threatens the explorers, and Marguerite fears that he may be linked to her past and come to settle old scores. The secret she tries to bury creates a rift between herself and Roxton.

programme.title: The Lost World: Finn
programme.desc: An experiment with new energy sources goes awry, launching Roxton, Challenger, and Marguerite 100 years into the future. They discover that the rest of the world has been ravaged by war.

programme.title: The Lost World: Suspicion
programme.desc: Finn joins the explorers at the Treehouse. A team of archeologists suffer disease, violence, and distrust after opening an ancient urn that may have housed a demonic spirit.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Philip Serrell thinks "big is best" on his shopping trip with rival expert Thomas Plant as they journey from York to Rotherham in search of a bargain.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Thomas Plant gets to ride in a special classic car and Philip Serrell has his eye on a unique lady, as they make their way through the Peak District.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: On the fourth leg of their road trip, Thomas Plant has a brush with showbiz and Philip Serrell takes a fancy to some gym equipment.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Experts Philip Serrell and Thomas Plant make some unlikely purchases on their last road trip and face a nail-biting finale at auction in Greenwich.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: It's the start of a new road trip as savvy antiques aficionados Mark Stacey and Paul Laidlaw pit their expertise against each other on their journey from Lancashire to Somerset.

programme.title: Tungsten Talk
programme.desc: ADC Global Champion Devon Petersen joins Tungsten Talk to discuss his trailblazing career.

programme.title: The Story of Nathan Aspinall
programme.desc: Henry Deacon and Paul Nicholson discuss Aspinall's grit and determination as a competitive force in darts.

programme.title: Tungsten Talk
programme.desc: David Williams, better known as Darts4Fun, discusses his career on the oche and as a social media personality.

programme.title: Tungsten Talk
programme.desc: Derek Coulson joins Tungsten Talk to learn more about this emerging talented competitor at the Super Series.

programme.title: The Story of Peter Wright
programme.desc: Henry Deacon and Paul Nicholson reflect on the story of Peter Wright discussing his career and achievements.

programme.title: Tungsten Talk
programme.desc: Gary Mawson joins Henry Deacon on Tungsten Talk to delve into memorable moments on the darts circuit.

programme.title: The Story of Luke Humphries
programme.desc: Henry Deacon and Paul Nicholson discuss Luke Humphries' journey from rising star to PDC World Champion.

programme.title: Catfish UK: Esther & Theo
programme.desc: Esther's finally found her match in Theo. But he always refuses to video call. So it's up to Julia and Oobah to find out if Theo is who he says he is. (S1, ep6)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Taylor & Brad
programme.desc: Taylor is falling in love with Brad despite never having seen his face. Can Oobah and Nella find the man of her dreams, and will Taylor get her happy ever after? (S2, ep6)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Jordan & Austin
programme.desc: After two years of chatting, Jordan believes Austin is the one. But every time they arrange to meet, Austin cancels. Can Julie and Oobah finally bring them together? (S1, ep9)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Rob & Sarah
programme.desc: Oobah is joined by Nathan Henry to help Rob track down his soulmate, Sarah. After two and a half years, Sarah has suddenly gone quiet and it's up to Oobah and Nathan to investigate. (S2, ep7)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Hayley & Alex
programme.desc: Oobah is joined by Catfish US royalty Kamie to help Hayley finally meet Alex. But after five months of avoiding phone calls and cancelling on her, will she get her a fairy tale ending? (S2, ep4)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Luke & Amy
programme.desc: Drummer Luke first started talking to nurse Amy when she came to one of his gigs 6 months ago. They had an instant spark but unfortunately every time they try and meet she cancels. (S2, ep9)

programme.title: 48 Hours: Web of Seduction
programme.desc: A report on problems which arise when children under the age of 17 receive unwanted sexual letters on the Internet, focusing on Lindsay, a 14-year-old suburban Florida girl who began receiving explicit love letters from a stranger in Greece.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Murder at Sea?
programme.desc: The disappearance of newlywed George Smith, who vanished from a cruise in the Mediterranean. This report uncovers the questionable alibis, failed polygraphs and a provocative video that involves the three men who last saw Smith alive.

programme.title: 48 Hours: A Family Accused
programme.desc: A report that focuses on cases where people accused of sexually abusing children were tried and imprisoned based on little real evidence other than the testimony of young children.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Live to Tell: Full Moon
programme.desc: In August 1996, Yvette Rodier and Zach Snarr went to the mountains for their date to take photos of the full moon, when a stranger drove up, pulled out a gun and opened fire. Zach was killed. Yvette, shot four times, survived by pretending to be dead.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Walking Free
programme.desc: The story of David Camm, who was convicted in two murder trials -- each eventually overturned -- and was found not guilty in his third trial for the murder of his wife and two children.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Buried Secrets of Las Vegas
programme.desc: A report on the death of gaming tycoon Ted Binion, who was found dead in his Las Vegas home. Paranoid about his wealth, he stashed millions of dollars’ worth of silver in a hidden vault in Pahrump, Nevada.
